user.title: KI-Essensplaner Setup
user.description: Configure the connection to your KI-Essensplaner API.

onboarding_check.title: Onboarding Status

onenote_auth.title: OneNote Authentication
onenote_auth.description:
To connect your OneNote account:

**1.** Open this link in a new tab:
**{verification_uri}**

**2.** Enter this code:
# {user_code}

**3.** Sign in with your Microsoft account

**4.** Click 'Submit' below when done

The import will start automatically after authentication.

onenote_auth_wait.title: Waiting for Authentication
onenote_auth_wait.description:
Please complete the authentication in your browser.

Once you've signed in with Microsoft, the setup will continue automatically.

notebook_selection.title: Select Notebooks
notebook_selection.description:
Select which OneNote notebooks contain your meal plans.

You can select multiple notebooks. Leave empty to skip import.

profile_generation.title: Generate Profile
profile_generation.description:
The final step will analyze your imported meals and generate a preference profile.

This helps the AI learn your cooking preferences, favorite ingredients, and meal patterns.

Click Submit to generate your profile.

rate_recipe.name: Rate Recipe
rate_recipe.description: Rate a recipe from 1 to 5 stars. Recipes rated with 1 star are automatically blacklisted.

recipe_id.name: Recipe ID
recipe_id.description: The database ID of the recipe to rate

exclude_ingredient.name: Exclude Ingredient
exclude_ingredient.description: Exclude an ingredient from all future recipe searches.

ingredient_name.name: Ingredient Name
ingredient_name.description: Name of the ingredient to exclude

remove_ingredient_exclusion.name: Remove Ingredient Exclusion
remove_ingredient_exclusion.description: Remove an ingredient from the exclusion list.

ingredient_name.name: Ingredient Name
ingredient_name.description: Name of the ingredient to remove from exclusions

refresh_profile.name: Refresh Profile
refresh_profile.description: Manually refresh the preference profile by analyzing all meal history.

generate_weekly_plan.name: Generate Weekly Plan
generate_weekly_plan.description: Generate a new weekly meal plan with recipe recommendations.

select_recipe.name: Select Recipe
select_recipe.description: Select an alternative recipe for a specific meal slot.

recipe_index.name: Recipe Index
recipe_index.description: Index of the alternative recipe (0-4) or -1 for none

set_recipe_url.name: Set Recipe URL
set_recipe_url.description: Set a custom recipe URL for a specific meal slot. The URL will be scraped and used like other recipes.

complete_week.name: Complete Week
complete_week.description: Mark the current weekly plan as completed and persist cooked meals. Optionally generate a new plan afterwards.

generate_next.name: Generate Next Plan
generate_next.description: Automatically generate a new weekly plan after completion

fetch_recipes.name: Fetch Recipes
fetch_recipes.description: Fetch and scrape recipes for all meal URLs that are not yet linked to a recipe.

delay_seconds.name: Delay Seconds
delay_seconds.description: Delay between requests to avoid rate limiting.
